meanings.definition: A structure of open latticework, especially one used as a support for climbing plants.
meanings.sent1: The trelliswork in the garden helps the vines grow upwards.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate trelliswork supporting the blooming roses.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the trelliswork as a jungle gym.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams climbed the trelliswork of hope towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The trelliswork cast beautiful shadows in the afternoon sun.

meanings.definition: The pattern or design created by interlacing strips of wood or metal.
meanings.sent1: The trelliswork on the chair was elegant and detailed.
meanings.sent2: The trelliswork on the gate added a touch of sophistication to the entrance.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat left paw prints on the trelliswork of the table.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts weaved through the trelliswork of memories in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The trelliswork of stars twinkled in the night sky.
